item.title: MongoDB commands
item.description: Connect to mongo using SSL certificates mongo --host hostname --port 27027 -ssl --sslPEMKeyFile /path/to/file --sslCAFile /path/to/file Login as admin user use admin db.auth('user','passwd') show databases show databases show collections show collections explore collections db.collectionname.find()
